Package org.eclipse.gef4.geometry.shapes

Provides support for geometric calculations based on shapes.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Geometry Common abstraction over all geometric shapes.
 

Class Summary
Arc Represents the geometric shape of an arc, which is defined by its enclosing framing rectangle, a start angle (relative to the x-axis), and an angular extend (in CCW direction).
CubicCurve Represents the geometric shape of a cubic Bézier curve.
Ellipse Represents the geometric shape of an ellipse, which is defined by means of its enclosing framing rectangle.
Line Represents the geometric shape of a line (or linear curve).
Path Represents the geometric shape of a path, which may consist of independent subgraphs.
Polygon Represents the geometric shape of a convex polygon.
Polyline Represents the geometric shape of a polyline.
QuadraticCurve Represents the geometric shape of a quadratic Bézier curve.
Rectangle Represents the geometric shape of a rectangle, where a rectangle is characterized by means of its upper left corner (x,y) and its size (width, height).
RoundedRectangle Represents the geometric shape of a rounded rectangle, i.e. a rectangle with rounded corners.
 

Package org.eclipse.gef4.geometry.shapes Description

Provides support for geometric calculations based on shapes.
